amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, provides for equal representation between employees and representatives of management during negotiations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require, as much as practicable, that workplace involvement groups be comprised, to the greatest extent practicable, of an equal representation of workers and management personnel.
